issue.title: www.thepinknews.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://www.thepinknews.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thepinknews.com) ### Comment > With AdGuard enabled, 'thepinknews.com' briefly loads for a split second and then the entire website goes blank. It happens for all webpages on the site and the issue started recently, maybe within the last couple of weeks. > > I'm seeing the issue using Safari in macOS and iOS. My Windows PC running Edge with uBlock Origin and Disconnect (no AdGuard) doesn't have this issue. > > Note that I see the same issue in Safari using Wipr 2 instead of AdGuard, so I suspect it's something to do with how Safari content blocking works. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pz5yfakmn3ksk8k8sscs84kso00wko0f2xzhpjuolk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ct9meyx0qtwsk48w48ko48gogogw4cooc21un1js68.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/grze7rcshlsg8w8k0ooc0gwgoo4k0kk6axq1qufw84.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jkni4uqo3rk8wswwcc000wsgk88880wiszky0xwa1s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.22 System version: | macOS 15.5 Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
Adblock Warning Removal List,

issue.title: www.thepinknews.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://www.thepinknews.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.thepinknews.com) ### Comment > With AdGuard enabled, 'thepinknews.com' briefly loads for a split second and then the entire website goes blank. It happens for all webpages on the site and the issue started recently, maybe within the last couple of weeks. > > I'm seeing the issue using Safari in macOS and iOS. My Windows PC running Edge with uBlock Origin and Disconnect (no AdGuard) doesn't have this issue. > > Note that I see the same issue in Safari using Wipr 2 instead of AdGuard, so I suspect it's something to do with how Safari content blocking works. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pz5yfakmn3ksk8k8sscs84kso00wko0f2xzhpjuolk.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
> 2 - а как измеряли? Настройки были идентичными?

В настройках разработчика в запущенных процессах смотрел. Да и на 4pda писали об этом.

Ну почти идентичными, так как функционал изменился. Но я наизусть помню настройки в 3 версии и старался также настроить 4-ую.

> 6 - не понял. Вижу версию SDK и в v3 и в v4.

Я имею ввиду это
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d06b23a0-d599-4a44-93c8-a3e3eb41548f)
